attributes.action: ban the use of Ford Ka's for anyone other than students and single mums
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have a friend called Rory Halliday whose father drives a ford Ka which Rory detests and wants to get rid of. WE dislike this vechile because it only seats 2 in the back, has a terrible rear and we feel it fits too closely into the Fiesta category than it shouldI personally feel that the only groups whom this vechile is acceptable for are students under 25 and single mothers. We urge the goverment and Ford to restrict the use of this vechile.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
